messages.content:
We can connect over a call for more clarity if needed. 
9005464412
One can now search by location or lake id and see if their house/land or apartment falls in either FTL or buffer zone directly on our website

Hello from 1acre.in ð, 

In context to recent demolitions by HYDRAA, We are digitising HMDA lakes with their FTL and buffer zones so people can understand if their lands falls in these zones instantly. 

Link : www.1acre.in/lakes

We believe it helps a lot of people who are currently in distress. See if you can help spread the word about this :) 

Thanks,
Team 1acre
